  1. Why can I not record in Windows?

  6. Why can't I record my electronic keyboard or electronic instrument using the USB cable?
  7. Why doesn't recording from YouTube (or other streaming audio) work?
  8. Why do I get crackles, pops, or distortion when the recording is loud?
  9. Why do I see a lot of vertical red lines in the track I just recorded?
  10. Why is the Audacity recording slider grayed out on maximum?
  11. How can I record without small skips or duplications?
  12. Why does my recording keep pausing automatically or why is my recording cursor stuck?
  13. Why do I get only a flat line and no sound when I try to record?
  14. Why do I get a periodic noise every 6 - 12 seconds?
  15. How can I prevent a half-volume mono recording?
  16. How can I prevent unbalanced or poorly separated stereo recording?
  17. How can I correct an unbalanced stereo recording?
  18. Why is the recorded waveform not centered on the horizontal line at 0.0?
